summary: This module provides a class that encapsulates the management of a UI event handler: it stores a callable, offers a utility to invoke the handler safely (including support for asynchronous functions), and supplies a getter to retrieve the stored handler, enabling consistent event processing across the framework.
business_intent: To simplify and standardize how event callbacks are attached, invoked, and accessed within the UI framework, abstracting async handling and null checks so developers can work with events more reliably.
